question:
An IT Engineer needs to create a Virtual Machine in Azure.
Currently, the IT Engineer has an Android OS based workstation.
Which of the following can the IT Engineer use to create the desired Virtual Machine in Azure.
[select 3]

Which of the following customers are eligible to use
Azure Government to develop a cloud solution.
(Select TWO)

A company is planning to set up an Azure Free Account.
Does the Standard Support plan come along with the Azure Free Account?

A company is planning to use its Azure Free Account for hosting production-based resources.
Does the Azure Free Account allow you to host production-based resources?

Your company is planning to use Azure AD for the
authentication of the resources defined in Azure.
Does Azure AD have the capabilities to implement
authorization using Azure RBAC to secure resources?

Does the Azure AD Premium P2 tier guarantee any Azure AD
Services available with the availability higher than 99.99%?

A company plans to upgrade its current Azure AD Free plan to the Azure AD Premium P1 plan.
Does Microsoft provide the same feature set for both plans?

A company wants to try out some services which Azure is offering in Public Preview.
Do the services in Public Preview in Azure come with an SLA?

A company wants to try out some services which Azure is offering in preview.
Does Microsoft provide a separate portal to work with preview features?

Your company needs to deploy and manage several
Azure Web apps using the Azure App service resource.
Which of the following URL would you use to manage the Azure Web Apps?

A company needs to store 2 TB worth of data that is infrequently used.
The data needs to be accessed via Power BI.
Which of the following could be used as a cost-effective data layer for this requirement?

A company wants to ensure that their company's users are authenticated
when they access resources defined in their Azure account.
Which of the following is the correct definition of authentication?

options.A: This specifies the type of service you can use in Azure.
options.B: This specifies the type of data you can use in Azure.
options.C: This is the act of providing legitimate credentials.
options.D: This specifies what you can do in Azure.

question:
A company is planning to create several Virtual Machines in Azure.
Which of the following is the right category to which the Azure Virtual Machine belongs?

A company needs to create around 50 customized Virtual Machines.
Out of these, only 20 are Windows-based Virtual machines which are identical,
and 30 are Ubuntu Machines, again of identical configuration.
All virtual machines will be used in a load-balanced configuration.
Which of the following would help reduce the administrative effort required to deploy the machines?

A company wants to use Azure for the deployment of various solutions.
They want to ensure that whenever users authenticate to Azure, they have to use Multi-Factor Authentication.
Which of the following can help them achieve this?

A company is planning to host 2 Virtual Machines in Azure.
Would you still incur a cost on the storage?
Which of the following is true when it comes to SaaS?

options.A: You are responsible for scalability of the solution.
options.B: You are responsible for the maintenance of the underlying hardware
options.C: You are responsible for configuring the application settings.
options.D: You are responsible for the high availability of the solution.

question:
A company is planning to set up an Enterprise Azure Subscription.
Do they need to have a valid Microsoft Azure account on EA Portal
(https://ea.azure.com/) for associating the Azure Subscription?

An IT administrator for a company has been given a PowerShell script.
This PowerShell script will be used to create several Virtual Machines in Azure.
You have to provide a machine to the IT administrator for running the PowerShell script

An IT administrator for a company has been given a PowerShell script.
This PowerShell script will be used to create several Virtual Machines in Azure.
You have to provide a machine to the IT administrator for running the PowerShell script.
You decide to provide a LinuxOS-based machine (with Ubuntu) and use Azure Cloud Shell.
Would this solution fit the requirement?

An IT administrator for a company has been given a PowerShell script.
This PowerShell script will be used to create several Virtual Machines in Azure.
You have to provide a machine to the IT administrator for running the PowerShell script.
You decide to provide an Azure CLI installed on a computer that has MacOS 10.13 and PowerShell 7.0.3 also installed.

You decide to provide an Azure CLI installed on a computer that has MacOS 10.13 and PowerShell 7.0.3 also installed.
An Integration solution for the deployment of code.
Which of the following would be best suited for this requirement?

A company is planning to set up a solution in Azure.
The solution would have the following key requirement.
A tool that provides guidance and recommendations to improve an Azure environment.
Which of the following would be best suited for this requirement?

A company is planning to set up a solution in Azure.
The solution would have the following key requirement.
A simplified tool to build intelligent Artificial Intelligence applications.
Which of the following would be best suited for this requirement?

A company is planning to set up a solution in Azure.
The solution would have the following key requirement.
A tool used to monitor Web applications hosted in production-based environments.
Which of the following would be best suited for this requirement?

A company needs to implement a solution in Azure.
Below are the key requirements for this solution.
No need for schema or Index management.
Ensure low latency access to data from around the world.
Which of the following data solution would you consider for this requirement?

A company is planning to deploy Azure resources to a resource group.
But the resources would belong to different locations.
Can you have resources that belong to the same resource group but be in multiple locations?

A company is planning to deploy Azure resources to a resource group.
The company is planning to assign tags to the resource groups.
Would the resources in the resource group also inherit the same tags?

A company is planning to deploy Azure resources to a resource group.
The company is planning to assign permissions to the resource groups.
Would the resources in the resource group also inherit the same permissions?
